The April 2021 lineup for PS Plus is Oddworld: Soulstorm (PS5), Days Gone (PS4), and Zombie Army 4: Dead War (PS4)
Sony is back with three games for PlayStation Plus in April, and it's an interestin… [+1637 chars]
